mapper.update: merge into cmt_tb using dual on ( trunc(sysdate, 'dd') = trunc(cmt_str_tm, 'dd') and stf_sq = #{stf_sq} ) when not matched then insert (cmt_sq, stf_sq, cmt_str_tm, cmt_msg) values (cmt_tb_cmt_sq.nextval, #{stf_sq}, sysdate, #{cmt_msg})
mapper.select:
select b.scd_nm, a.cmt_sq, a.stf_sq, a.cmt_str_tm, a.cmt_end_tm, a.cmt_msg, a.days, b.ldt, to_char(trunc(b.ldt, 'dd'), 'mm.dd') || '(' ||to_char(b.ldt, 'dy')|| ')' cmt_dt from ( select cmt_sq, stf_sq, cmt_str_tm, cmt_end_tm, cmt_msg, trunc(cmt.cmt_str_tm, 'dd') days from cmt_tb cmt where stf_sq = #{stf_sq} ) a, ( select * from (
select trunc(to_date(#{startDate}), 'dd')+level-1 ldt
select trunc(sysdate, 'MM')+level-1 ldt
from dual
connect by level <= to_date(#{endDate})-trunc(to_date(#{startDate}), 'dd')+1
connect by level <= last_day(sysdate)-trunc(sysdate, 'MM')+1
)l, ( select scd.dt, scd.stf_sq, div.scd_nm from ( select * from ( select trunc(bs_scd_str_dt, 'dd') dt, stf_sq, scd_sq from bs_scd_tb where stf_sq = #{stf_sq} order by dt) scda union select * from ( select trunc(bs_scd_end_dt, 'dd') dt, stf_sq, scd_sq from bs_scd_tb where stf_sq = #{stf_sq} order by dt) scdb )scd, scd_div_tb div where scd.scd_sq = div.scd_sq and scd.scd_sq in (3, 5, 6) )r where l.ldt = r.dt(+) ) b where a.days(+) = b.ldt order by b.ldt

select stf_nm, cmt_str_tm, cmt_end_tm, cmt_msg, rnk_sq, rnk_nm, dpt_nm from ( select sub.stf_nm, c.cmt_str_tm, c.cmt_end_tm, c.cmt_msg, sub.rnk_sq, sub.rnk_nm, sub.dpt_nm, to_char(c.cmt_str_tm, 'yy/mm/dd') dd from cmt_tb c, ( select s.stf_sq, s.stf_nm, rnk.rnk_sq, rnk.rnk_nm, d.dpt_nm from stf_tb s, dpt_div_tb d, rnk_tb rnk where s.dpt_sq = d.dpt_sq and s.dpt_sq = #{dpt_sq} and s.rnk_sq = rnk.rnk_sq )sub where c.stf_sq(+) = sub.stf_sq )l, (
select to_char(to_date(#{searchDate}), 'yy/mm/dd') dd
select to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd') dd
from dual )r where l.dd = r.dd or l.dd is null order by rnk_sq desc
